trans-unit.target: Sort and separate terms by initial

trans-unit.source: Show terms after using the pagination?
trans-unit.target: Show terms after using the pagination??

trans-unit.source: Hide terms, until pagination is used. This will help to keep usability, if a lot of terms are shown.
